name: Kung Fu Girl
description:
She is a little girl but she is strong, smart, agile and brave.
She has the ultimate Kung Fu from Shaolin.
The zombies attacked her village. She had to become the warrior and fighter to protect the people.
The kungfu battle has begun.
------------------------------
FEATURES:
• Fantastic 3D graphics quality
• Ultimate skills with special combos
• 27 fierce battles
• 999 challenge missions
• Hundreds of zombies with 7 levels
• Fast action gameplay
------------------------------
Enjoy it and hope you feel good!
